message.body: Hey kid, I want to see you.
That can be arranged. What's yr timeline? I'm free till 4 today & i'm also loosely organizing an art viewing evening on Thursday evening.
Pardon my redundancy. I just really wanted to make clear kit's Thursday evening.
Do you feel like coming to MPLS now? I'm at common roots. And what is kit's?
Sorry - i just woke up after a long night at 1st Ave. I could be to Common Roots in 45 minutes if you're sticking around there for awhile.
Can do. Don't bike drunk or anything.
Ha, no worries. This old man just hasn't been out past midnight in months. Being up until 3 was rough. See you soon, Martha.
